meanings.definition: A colorless liquid hydrocarbon compound with the formula C8H18, used as a standard for gasoline performance.
meanings.sent1: The isooctane helped determine the quality of the gasoline.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic tested the fuel with isooctane to measure its performance.
meanings.sent3: The isooctane in the lab decided to challenge the other chemicals to a race.
meanings.sent4: The isooctane stood out among the other compounds like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The isooctane's role as a gasoline standard was crucial for the experiment.
